title: Flash Tide: A Sea Otter's Speed

protagonist.name: Finn 'Flash' Ripley
protagonist.appearance: Sleek dark brown fur, wearing crimson red Flash super suit with gold lightning bolt emblem across chest, white whiskers, athletic streamlined build, goggle-style mask, red cape that flows underwater
protagonist.personality: Quick-witted, heroic, protective of ocean life, determined, speed enthusiast
protagonist.powers: Super speed swimming, creates blue lightning trails underwater, can vibrate through obstacles

mentor.name: Captain Current
mentor.appearance: Grey fur with silver streaks, weathered superhero suit with anchor emblem, wise eyes

villain.name: Dr. Undertow
villain.appearance: Dark purple tentacles, mechanical enhancements, glowing green eyes, laboratory coat

sidekick.name: Spark
sidekick.appearance: Small, energetic, generates natural electricity, tiny red bandana

citizens.description: Various sea creatures living in the underwater city
